title: Wanted: More players with great stories
body:
Recently with [Live/Play](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aVijgcPQIXE), we saw five players from five very different corners of the world. We want to continue to share compelling things currently happening in the community, but we need your help.
 
Beyond friendships and relationships formed through League, we want to hear about people and events that really inspire us, give us chills, or make us laugh. Beyond that, it’s even better if something’s happening in the coming months. We’re all for campfire stories, but it’s even better if we can capture the story as it happens!
 
Just some thought starters:
Playing League from an unsupported territory or under weird, or amazing circumstances?
Turning League-passion into a career or at least some side cash?
Using League as a tool for education or advocacy?
We’re very open to submissions outside of North America and Europe.
 
Even if you aren’t the protagonist, go ahead and tell us your favorite story at playerstories-rg@riotgames.com

** EDIT **
Thanks everyone! We've really enjoyed reading everyone's stories and submissions so far, we're sorting through them and reading every single one. (even the trolls)
We're looking especially hard for individuals who anticipate something happening in the next few months or so. Let us know if you're in the middle of or planning something!
